definitions: specialized structure in a living body that performs a specific vital function
large keyboard instrument producing sound through pipes
examples: The heart is a vital organ that pumps blood throughout the body
Doctors successfully transplanted the donor organ into the patient
She practiced the wedding march on the church organ
The organ concert featured Bach's most complex compositions

definitions: the process or moment of beginning an activity or journey
examples: Starting a new business requires careful planning and dedication
The starting of the race was delayed due to weather

definitions: rectangular block of hardened clay used for building walls
examples: The old house was built with red bricks and mortar
Each brick must be carefully placed to ensure stability

definitions: internal organs of the digestive system, especially the intestines
deep instinctive feeling or emotional response about something
examples: The doctor examined the patient's gut for signs of inflammation
Probiotics help maintain healthy bacteria in your gut
Trust your gut when making important life decisions
My gut tells me something isn't right about this deal

definitions: arrangement made in advance to secure accommodation, a table, or seat
feeling of doubt or uncertainty about something
examples: Please make a reservation for dinner at seven o'clock
The hotel reservation was confirmed for next weekend
She expressed reservations about the new company policy
Despite some reservations, they decided to proceed with the plan

definitions: person who resists or fights against authority, control, or tradition
examples: The rebels fought against the oppressive government for years
James Dean became an icon as the young rebel

definitions: large deciduous tree producing acorns and valuable hardwood timber
examples: The mighty oak tree has stood for over two hundred years
Oak furniture is prized for its durability and beauty

definitions: person who teaches a subject or skill, especially in practical areas
examples: The yoga instructor demonstrated the proper breathing techniques
My driving instructor was patient with nervous beginners

definitions: prejudice, discrimination, or antagonism against people based on their race or ethnicity
examples: The organization works tirelessly to combat racism in all forms
Education is crucial in addressing systemic racism in society

definitions: regular payment made to retired employees from a fund they contributed to
examples: After thirty years of service, she receives a comfortable pension
The company increased its pension contributions for all employees

definitions: chronic medical condition where the body cannot properly regulate blood sugar levels
examples: Managing diabetes requires careful monitoring of blood glucose levels
Type 2 diabetes can often be controlled through diet and exercise

definitions: close group or bunch of similar things or people gathered together
examples: A cluster of stars sparkled in the night sky
The cluster of grapes hung heavy on the vine

definitions: psychoactive drug from the cannabis plant used medically or recreationally
examples: Medical marijuana is prescribed for certain chronic pain conditions
Several states have legalized recreational marijuana use

definitions: fighting between armed forces, especially in war
examples: The soldiers were trained for hand-to-hand combat
Veterans often struggle with memories of combat

definitions: set of clothes worn to portray a character or for special occasions
examples: She wore an elaborate princess costume for Halloween
The actors changed into their period costumes before the play

definitions: process of being mentally stimulated to do or feel something creative
examples: Nature has always been her greatest source of inspiration
The coach's speech provided inspiration for the struggling team

definitions: round citrus fruit with bright reddish-yellow peel and juicy flesh
bright reddish-yellow color like that of the fruit
examples: She peeled the orange and shared it with her friend
Fresh orange juice tastes better than the bottled kind
The sunset painted the sky in brilliant shades of orange
He wore an orange safety vest while working

definitions: practice or skill of preparing food by heating
examples: Her cooking has improved since taking the culinary class
Cooking dinner together became their favorite weekend activity

definitions: secret plan by a group to do something unlawful or harmful
examples: The conspiracy to overthrow the government was eventually exposed
Internet forums often spread wild conspiracy theories

definitions: distinguishing quality or characteristic belonging to a person
examples: Honesty is an admirable trait in any leader
Genetic traits are passed from parents to children

definitions: covered motor vehicle used for transporting goods or groups of people
examples: The delivery van arrived with our new furniture
They rented a van for their cross-country road trip

definitions: strong-smelling bulb used as flavoring in cooking and medicine
examples: Add minced garlic to the pasta sauce for extra flavor
Garlic has been used for centuries for its health benefits

definitions: act of taking liquid into the body through the mouth
examples: Drinking enough water is essential for good health
Social drinking is common at business networking events

definitions: transparent mineral with a regular atomic structure forming geometric shapes
high-quality glass used for fine glassware and decorative objects
examples: The geologist discovered a beautiful quartz crystal in the cave
Salt forms cubic crystals when it solidifies
The wedding gifts included expensive crystal wine glasses
She inherited her grandmother's collection of crystal figurines

definitions: continuous area or expanse of land or water
act of extending one's body or limbs to full length
examples: This stretch of highway runs through beautiful mountain scenery
The desert stretch seemed endless under the blazing sun
A good morning stretch helps wake up your muscles
The yoga instructor emphasized the importance of proper stretching

definitions: person who does something as their paid occupation
argument or consideration in favor of something
examples: She turned pro after winning several amateur tournaments
The golf pro offered lessons at the country club
Let's list the pros and cons before making a decision
One pro of living downtown is easy access to restaurants

definitions: partner or colleague in business or professional activities
person connected with another in some way
examples: Her business associate handles the financial side of operations
The law firm promoted several associates to partner status
He's a close associate of the company president
Former associates gathered for the retirement celebration

definitions: aircraft that derives lift from horizontally revolving overhead rotors
examples: The medical helicopter transported the patient to the trauma center
Traffic helicopters provide real-time updates during rush hour

definitions: lawyer or group of lawyers giving legal advice and representation
formal advice or guidance on conduct or procedure
examples: The defendant's counsel objected to the prosecutor's line of questioning
She hired experienced counsel for the complex litigation
Seek counsel from trusted friends before making major decisions
The therapist provided counsel during difficult times

definitions: mathematical statement showing that two expressions are equal
examples: Students learned to solve quadratic equations in algebra class
The equation balanced perfectly when variables were substituted

definitions: choice, judgment, or control of when something should be done
examples: Perfect timing is crucial for successful comedy delivery
The timing of the announcement couldn't have been worse

definitions: bishop of Rome as head of the Roman Catholic Church
examples: The pope addressed thousands of faithful in Vatican Square
Cardinals gather to elect a new pope after one dies

definitions: dramatic work combining text and musical score performed by singers and orchestra
examples: The opera house premiered a new production of Carmen
She trained for years to sing opera professionally

definitions: mountain or large hill, often used in proper names
support or frame on which something is fixed
examples: Mount Everest remains the ultimate challenge for climbers
The monastery sits atop the ancient mount
The telescope needs a sturdy mount for stable viewing
Picture frames were arranged on decorative wall mounts

definitions: sign or piece of information suggesting something
examples: Early indication suggests the treatment is working effectively
There's no indication that prices will decrease soon

definitions: reason for doing something, especially one that is hidden
examples: Police investigators searched for a motive behind the crime
Understanding customer motives helps improve marketing strategies

definitions: covered structure at the entrance of a building
examples: They enjoyed morning coffee on the front porch
The porch swing creaked gently in the evening breeze

definitions: steady intent look directed at someone or something
examples: She held his gaze for a moment before looking away
The cat's unwavering gaze followed the bird's movements

definitions: flat area between waist and knees when sitting
one circuit of a track or pool
examples: The cat curled up contentedly in her lap
The child sat on his grandfather's lap during story time
She swam fifty laps in the pool every morning
The race car completed another lap around the track

definitions: first course of a meal served before the main dish
device for starting an engine or initiating a process
examples: The restaurant offers soup or salad as a starter
We ordered bruschetta as our starter before pizza
The car won't start because the starter motor is broken
Press the starter button to begin the washing cycle

definitions: senior military officer rank above lieutenant colonel and below brigadier
examples: The colonel commanded respect from all soldiers under his leadership
She was promoted to colonel after twenty years of service

definitions: meat from cattle, especially adult cows or bulls
examples: The restaurant specializes in aged beef steaks
Ground beef is a versatile ingredient for many dishes

definitions: annual holiday celebrating harvest and blessings, traditionally with family gathering
examples: The family gathered for Thanksgiving dinner with turkey and stuffing
Thanksgiving traditions include expressing gratitude and sharing meals

definitions: quality of being intense, extreme, or having strong force or feeling
examples: The intensity of the storm surprised even experienced meteorologists
She approached every task with remarkable intensity and focus

definitions: large natural hollow in the ground or in a hillside
examples: Ancient people used the cave for shelter and ceremonies
Bats hung from the cave ceiling in the darkness

definitions: floor of a building partly or entirely below ground level
examples: They converted the basement into a comfortable family room
Water damage in the basement required immediate attention

definitions: picture or diagram that explains or decorates a text
examples: The biology textbook contained detailed illustrations of cell structure
Children's books often feature colorful illustrations on every page

definitions: intrinsic nature or indispensable quality determining something's character
examples: Patience is the essence of good teaching
The essence of her argument was that change takes time

definitions: object for holding or transporting something
examples: Store leftovers in an airtight container to keep them fresh
The shipping container held thousands of electronic devices

definitions: building or room equipped for physical exercise and sports
examples: She goes to the gym every morning before work
The school gym hosts basketball games and assemblies
